channel.title: Hosted Redash End of Life
channel.description: Hi, I have seen that redash is about to close app.redash.io. Is it really going to happen? I have done a lot of work on redash.io. I know they have given a method to save my reports but where they are going to shift. I mean what will happen to my redash reports. Thanks

item.title: Hosted Redash End of Life
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Hi there, yes Hosted Redash will be discontinued on 30 November 2021. After that date you will not be able to login at app.redash.io.

There are a couple options going forward:

If you would like to continue using Redash, you can deploy a copy of it on your own server. Weâ€™ve just released V10 of Redash and will provide a script in the coming days to move your data from app.redash.io to your own server.

If you would prefer to move forward with a different tool, you can also simply export your queries as text files and use them in whatever SQL tool you prefer.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosted Redash End of Life
item.dc:creator: BalawalAli
item.description:
Hi,
I have seen that redash is about to close app.redash.io. Is it really going to happen?
I have done a lot of work on redash.io. I know they have given a method to save my reports but where they are going to shift. I mean what will happen to my redash reports.
Thanks
